environment_variables.Data_Directory: path to the directory containing input datasets
environment_variables.Test_topo_regen: boolean flag to indicate test mode
environment_variables.highResDataset: name of the high resolution topography dataset
environment_variables.cami: name of the CAM input file
environment_variables.glandMaskFile: name of the Greenland mask file
environment_variables.topoDatasetDef: name of the topography dataset definition file
environment_variables.topoDataset: name of the topography dataset file
environment_variables.c2tOutputDir: path to the cube_to_target output directory
environment_variables.c2t060: name of the cube_to_target output file with 60-point smoother
environment_variables.c2t008: name of the cube_to_target output file with 8-point smoother
